# Bhopal News: No Road, No Toll; Saint Community Stages Massive Demo Over Delayed NH-719 Work

## The protest highlighted the poor condition of NH-719, dubbed a Maut Ka Highway" by Congress MLA Hemant Katare, who joined the protest. Protesters also cited hundreds of fatalities over two years, including that of cows. The saint community alleged that despite a meeting with Union Minister Nitin Gadkari seven months ago, where he emphasised building the road before collecting toll,
